text: Hello there, how are you doing today, I wonder if you are currently donating to any charitable organiation
I do not actively donate but if it is offered at a supermarket I may donate.
Well, perhaps you would be interested in making a donation to Save The Children
Can you tell me more about this organization. How do I save the children?
That is the name of the charity, and well, they help children in need, not only with food or resources, but also in developed countries where there are childrens that cannot go to school
Is this a not for profit organization?
Yes, all of the money you donate goes to helping children in need
Is there anyway to check progress on the children and where the money is going?
You can personally donate to one of their specific funding if you go to one of their offices
Do you know where the offices are located?
They have one in every major city of the country, otherwise you could check on their page
Do you have a website I can check?
URL Sure, it is this one
Thank you. Do you know if I can directly contribute there or do I have to go to a city to donate?
You can directly contribute by making a donation from 0 to 2$ at the end of the task
This sounds great. I would like to donate 1 dollar.
I am glad you decided to donate, all of your money will be used for a good cause
I know it will. You seem to know a lot about this organization
Thanks, I will be donating a dollar as well at the end of the task
That is fantastic I am glad you are
